text: Adventure is the best way to learn.
author: Unknown

text: The best memories are made on the trail.
author: Unknown

text: Little footsteps today, big journeys tomorrow.
author: DADVENTURES

text: Time spent with children is never wasted.
author: Dawn Lantero

text: In every walk with nature, one receives far more than he seeks.
author: John Muir

text: We don’t remember days, we remember moments.
author: Cesare Pavese
